title: aula-assistant/config.yaml
description: Schema for the Aula Assistant configuration file

defaults.description: Defaults to use if not specified otherwise via command line arguments

tablet_mode.description: Enable tablet mode (no app bar, no window controls)

security.description: Security settings. Note: This is not a security feature but rather a convenience feature to prevent non-technical users from being overwhelmed by all the features.

advanced_pin.description: Pin to access advanced features. Note: This is not a security feature
